item.title: Magento_expert
item.description: https://www.freelancer.com/projects/seo/Magento-Installation-Customization/details I’m looking for a professional Magento 2 expert to install a purchased theme on my website and customize it according to my needs. The theme can be found here: https://umino.bersky.co/demo_digital_3. Here’s what I need: Removal of unnecessary links from the theme (specific links will be communicated later) On-page SEO implementation to enhance website visibility Integration of my logo (which I will provide later) Updating of meta data to align with our brand and improve SEO Ideal candidates should have:
